item.title: HLSL pitfalls
item.description: Have encountered several issues of HLSL. Found most workaround/solution on internet. I'm afraid the list is still growing as I know more, put them in one place could be helpful. Denormalized float, small float/large uint This is a FXC only issue. First, there is asfloat(0x7FFFFF) => 0 from https://www.slideshare.net/DevCentralAMD/lowlevel-shader-optimization-for-nextgen-and-dx11-by-emil-persson asfloat always gives 0 if you feed bits fit denormalized pattern. asuint(asfloat(0x7FFFFF)) => 0 Then, floats smaller than 1e-6 won't make their way into output.
